summary: Meta Framework: Next.js | CSS: Tailwind CSS | Uses CSS Variables
fix_approach: Next.js: Use className prop for styling. Check globals.css for base styles. Component files are typically in /components or /app directories. For Tailwind issues, check tailwind.config.js for theme customization. Tailwind: Modify classes directly in JSX/HTML. For custom values, use arbitrary values like w-[200px] or extend theme in tailwind.config.js. Use @apply in CSS for reusable class combinations.
